title: An individual agreement shall be entered into by the owner/developer/co-operative housing society/NGO with the eligible hutment-dwellers in the slum/pavement
clause_text: An individual agreement shall be entered into by the owner/developer/co-operative housing society/NGO with the eligible hutment-dwellers in the slum/pavement.1.7 An individual agreement entered into between hutment-dweller and the owner/developer/co- operative society/ NGO shall be in the joint names of pramukh hutment dweller and spouse for every protected dwelling structure
